description.en: DAO dollar-pegged stablecoin with wrapped stable assets (from Curve, Convex and Stake DAO through Zunami Protocol) as collateral. $UZD is a rebase token with a balance that grows in proportion to Zunami Protocol APY. $UZD is secure from depeg, since it can be redeemed with USDT/USDC/DAI at any time.
